title: Nested Message Schema
description: Schema for validating nested message threads in Promethios

loop_id.description: Identifier for the loop this message belongs to

thread_id.description: Identifier for the thread this message belongs to

parent_id.description: Identifier of the parent message, or null if this is a root message

agent.description: The agent that created this message

role.description: The role of the message creator

depth.description: Nesting depth of the message (0 for root messages)

status.description: Status of the thread or message

actionable.description: Whether the thread contains actionable insights for plan revision

tags.description: Optional tags for categorizing the thread

topic_hash.description: Hash of the thread topic for future reference

plan_integration.description: Information about how this thread was integrated into a plan

integrated_at.description: When the thread was integrated into a plan

plan_step.description: The plan step that was affected by this thread

integration_type.description: How the thread was integrated into the plan

integration_summary.description: Summary of how the thread was integrated into the plan

last_updated_at.description: When the thread was last updated

reply_count.description: Number of replies in the thread

participants.description: List of agents participating in the thread
